Uses of Class
edu.rit.draw.item.ColorFill

Packages that use ColorFill
edu.rit.draw Package edu.rit.draw contains classes and programs for drawing diagrams and slides of all kinds. 
edu.rit.draw.item Package edu.rit.draw.item contains classes for the different kinds of drawing items that can appear in a Drawing. 
 

Uses of ColorFill in edu.rit.draw
 

Fields in edu.rit.draw declared as ColorFill
static ColorFill Drawing.NORMAL_BACKGROUND
          The normal background color (white).
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw that return ColorFill
 ColorFill Drawing.background()
          Returns this drawing's background color fill.
 

Methods in edu.rit.draw with parameters of type ColorFill
 Drawing Drawing.background(ColorFill theBackground)
          Set this drawing's background color fill.
